page.title: 04TRANSPORT ROAD TRAFFIC COUNT
page.content:
This report concerns a survey of road traffic movements along the principal road leading into and through Kibworth Harcourt, the A6. The survey was made between 0940 hours and 1500 hours on Tuesday 7th May, 1985, and was conducted in 80 minute periods. Traffic was monitored in both directions, that is from the direction of Leicester and from the direction of Market Harborough.
For the result tables the following code is used: {A.L._ Articulated Lorries {L._ Lorries {V._ Vans {C._ Cars {M.C._ Motor Cycles {B._ Bicycles
